properties.description: Determines if this animated object has custom settings.
properties.name: hasCustomSettings

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the AnimationSetting (a PageItem, HtmlItem, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, MediaItem, Sound, Movie, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Graphic, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Group or TextFrame).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The base animation preset applied. Can return: MotionPreset, String or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: preset

properties.description: The tranform offset percentage from the target object bounding box's left-top corner.
properties.name: transformOffsets

properties.description: The duration in second for this animation.
properties.name: duration

properties.description: The list of motion path points for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing pathPointArray:Array of Ordered array containing anchor:Array of 2 Reals, leftDirection:Array of 2 Reals, rightDirection:Array of 2 Reals, pathOpen:Boolean.
properties.name: motionPathPoints

properties.description: The list of motion path points and key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, pathPoint:Ordered array containing anchor:Array of 2 Reals, leftDirection:Array of 2 Reals, rightDirection:Array of 2 Reals.
properties.name: motionPath

properties.description: The list of opacity key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.
properties.name: opacityArray

properties.description: The list of rotation key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.
properties.name: rotationArray

properties.description: The list of scale x key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.
properties.name: scaleXArray

properties.description: The list of scale y key frames for this animation. Can return: Ordered array containing keyFrame:Long Integer, value:Real.
properties.name: scaleYArray

properties.description: The animation design option.
properties.name: designOption

properties.description: The ease type.
properties.name: easeType

properties.description: The number of times this animation plays.
properties.name: plays

properties.description: Set to true if animation play loops.
properties.name: playsLoop

properties.description: Determines if this object is initially hidden when displayed in an exported SWF file.
properties.name: initiallyHidden

properties.description: Determines if this object is hidden after its animation is played in an exported SWF file.
properties.name: hiddenAfter

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Save a copy of this motion preset to a InDesign motion preset file.

parameters.description: The Flash motion preset file to export to.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: saveACopy

methods.description: Save this motion preset as custom preset.

parameters.description: The name for the new motion preset.
parameters.name: name

methods.name: save

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the AnimationSetting.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
